title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: AE21006 (3 - 0 - 0): 3 Credits, Classical Sets and Fuzzy Sets, Classical Relation and Fuzzy relation, Properties of membership function, fuzzification and Defuzzification, Fuzzy arithmetic, Fuzzy control systems, feed forward neural network, recurrent neural network, back-propagation learning, neural control
